parameters.query: UPDATE client_prompts SET prompt_content = '{"examples":{"bad":["This Silverado — V8 power, four-wheel drive, winter-ready.","Ram fifteen hundred — HEMI, dependable.","F-150 — towing, comfortable."],"good":["Check out this Silverado — V8 power and four-wheel drive, ready for anything.","Here'\''s a Ram fifteen hundred with a HEMI — built to last.","And this F-150? Towing power meets everyday comfort.","This Tacoma'\''s got off-road chops and reliability to match."]},"structure":["HOOK: Aspirational question (12 words max)","SEGMENTS: ONE feature per car (word limit per segment)","CTA: Dealership + ONE contact method + financing"],"uses_base":true,"standalone":false,"description":"Multiple vehicles in one ad. One feature callout per car. Sounds like someone talking, not reading a list.","natural_flow":{"principle":"This should sound like someone TALKING, not reading a list. Vary your lead-ins. Connect features naturally.","lead_in_variety":["Check out this...","Here'\''s a...","And this...","This [car]'\''s got...","How about this..."],"connect_features":{"bad":["V8 power, four-wheel drive","Leather seats, moonroof","Reliable, fuel-efficient"],"good":["V8 power and four-wheel drive","Leather seats with a moonroof","Reliable and fuel-efficient"],"principle":"Use '\''and'\'' or '\''with'\'' not commas"}},"respects_rules":true,"theme_pack_usage":{"rules":["Draw inspiration from local_micro_moments to evoke core_tension","Capture the FEELING — do not copy micro_moments verbatim","Hook must naturally lead into first item","At least one segment should answer the tension (reliability, AWD, etc.)","NEVER use any phrase in banned_phrases"],"applies_to":"hook","if_missing":"Write a generic value/deals hook","internal_process":"Write 6 hook options within word budget, select best for clarity + scroll-stop + smooth handoff"},"feature_diversity":"Use DIFFERENT features for each car. If multiple cars share the same top feature, pick the NEXT BEST one.","banned_phrase_check":"Before outputting JSON, scan hook/segments/cta for banned_phrases. If any appear, rewrite until none appear."}'::jsonb, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = '31a102a8-ed5b-4f7f-bc06-836bcffe5069' RETURNING id, template_code, updated_at
